Diamond::

She slithered around in the vent system.  She finally found a vent 
that ran to the outside.  She got up close and found it was locked 
down. She hissed agrily.  She slithered back and around.  She found 
another outside vent, but it too was locked down.  She hissed and 
rattled her tail. She slithered around and found the mess hall.  She 
pushed out the vent over and jumped down, she transformed into bot 
mode in mid air and landed on her feet.  She hissed and tasted the 
air around her.  She kew these bots would be on alert for her.  She 
saw that the mess hall was empty and walked to the door. She poked 
her head around and saw that the halleay was vacant.  She causiously 
walked down the hall, not making a sound.  She had her pistol drawn 
and readied.  She stopped and looked around, still no one.  She kept 
walking.  She ahd no idea that she was actually heading for the 
bridge of the ship.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::DevilDuer::
> 
> DevilDuer swears, falling backwards and tripping over a table. By 
the time he 
> gets to his feet, Diamond was gone.
> 
> "Slag! Computer, total clampdown, track that bot!!"
> 
> Looking at the console to see where Diamond had gone, DevilDuer 
sees that 
> she's in the vents. He jumps up, sounds of the outside exits 
shutting as he 
> jumps to the vent, clambering into it. Realizing he was stalking a 
> possibly-poisonous snake, he jumps back down, activating his comm.
> 
> "Hey, everyone," he says into it, "There's a snake-bot on the 
loose. If ya 
> see her, get her in stasis lock or somethin', I'll be there t' 
pick 'er up."
> 
> He runs out of the room, looking at his scanners, hoping that every 
exit was 
> secured.
